VoxelCount: The size of the geometry bounding box major axis measured in voxels
bAutoSimplify: Automatically simplify the result of voxel-based meshes.
SimplifyMaxErrorFactor: The max error (as a multiple of the voxel size) to accept when simplifying the output
CubeRootMinComponentVolume: Automatically remove components smaller than this (to clean up any isolated floating bits)
